title: Mahindra enters electric small commercial segment with ZEO, starting at Rs 7.52 lakh
description: Mahindra Last Mile Mobility Limited unveiled the e-ZEO, an eco-friendly electric four-wheeler targeting the small commercial vehicle segment. Designed with high-voltage architecture for energy efficiency and quick charging, it aims to revolutionize urban logistics by offering a sustainable and cost-effective transportation solution.
